#id=1
#text=My hair had grown quite long , and it was getting more and more difficult to style it as I wanted in the morning .
#id=2
#text=I decided I needed to get a haircut .
#id=3
#text=I called my local salon and made an appointment .
#id=4
#text=Luckily they were able to cut my hair the next afternoon .
#id=5
#text=The next day I drove to the salon , and arrived a few minutes before my appointment .
#id=6
#text=I sat in the waiting chairs until my stylist was ready for me .
#id=7
#text=I sat in the large chair , while my stylist put a large cape around my neck and shoulders .
#id=8
#text=This would keep the hair trimmings off of my clothes and from going down my neck .
#id=9
#text=She asked me how I wanted my hair cut , and I told her I just wanted to keep the same style , but with several inches cut off so it would be easier to style .
#text=She then leaned my chair back toward the sink , and washed my hair .
#text=When she was done , she sat me up and combed my hair out straight .
#text=She then took her hair scissors and comb , and carefully combed out and snipped hair off in sections .
#text=She combed my hair in between each cut to make sure it was the right length .
#text=She went all around my head , alternately cutting and combing .
#text=When she was done cutting , she took the hair dryer and blew dry my hair , styling it as she went with a large brush .
#text=It felt very nice having someone work on my hair .
#text=I felt much lighter and my head did not feel as heavy with my long hair .
#text=When we were all done , she removed the cape and shook off all the hair .
#text=I looked in the mirror and loved my new haircut .
#text=I went to the cashier and paid for my haircut , and left a tip for my stylist as well , since she did a good job .
#text=I left the salon very happy with my haircut .
